title: Kylie Jenner goes makeup free as she joins BFF Stassie for Lasik surgery and a party for their sight
text:
It's official: Kylie Jenner has had some work done, and she's finally opening up about it.

The self-made billionaire recently went makeup free as she took in a round of Lasik surgery with her bestie Stassie Karanikolaou.

Stassie took to her YouTube channel Monday to share their experience, which was followed by a party for their sight.

Fresh-faced: Kylie Jenner recently went makeup free as she took in a round of Lasik surgery with her bestie Stassie Karanikolaou

The ladies started their day with a visit to Kylie's house, where they lounged around on some tiny furniture in Stormi's room.

Later that night, they got dolled up as they went out for a girls night with dinner at Nobu in Malibu.

Stassie revealed a rare glimpse of Kylie with glasses on as they tried to make it to the restaurant 10 minutes before closing.

The next morning, they were makeup free as they went in for their corrective procedure, of which Stassie shared a brief but graphic glimpse.

Stormi's room: Stassie posted the experience to her YouTube, as the ladies started their day with a visit to Kylie's house, where they lounged around on some tiny furniture in Stormi's room

Dinner looks: Later that night, they got dolled up as they went out for a girls night with dinner at Nobu in Malibu

Four eyes: Stassie revealed a rare glimpse of Kylie with glasses on as they tried to make it to the restaurant 10 minutes before closing

Drugged up: After the procedure, they sat together in a recovery room, where they were both incapacitated from the medication, before they crashed at Kylie's place for five hours

Perfect vision: The ladies reconvened the next day after their followup, both going makeup free once again as they basked in their new 20/20 vision

Afterward, they sat together in a recovery room, where they were both incapacitated from the medication, before they crashed at Kylie's place for five hours.

The ladies reconvened the next day after their followup, both going makeup free once again as they basked in their new 20/20 vision.

Stassie then announced an impromptu party celebrating their vision, set for the next day.

Reason to celebrate: Stassie then announced an impromptu party celebrating their vision, set for the next day, for which they donned some matching skintight pink latex bodycon dresses, featuring a big pop art eye print

Party bus: They were joined by some friends as they rented out a party bus for the last-minute celebration

Serving LOOKS: Stassie also took to Instagram, sans Kylie, to show off her curvy bod in the fun party dress

They both posed in the mirror as they modeled some matching skintight pink latex bodycon dresses, featuring a big pop art eye print.

They were joined by some friends as they rented out a party bus for the last-minute celebration.

Stassie also took to Instagram, sans Kylie, to show off her curvy bod in the fun party dress.

Their procedure comes after Kylie submitted to trademark the phrase 'rise and shine,' following her viral video.

Viral moment: Their procedure comes after Kylie submitted to trademark the phrase 'rise and shine,' following her viral video

The remix: The 22-year-old has inspired memes and remixes across social media after posting a video of herself singing the words to Stormi

The 22-year-old has inspired memes and remixes across social media after posting a video of herself singing the words to Stormi.

The video even broke a TikTok record, as views for videos under the #riseandshine hashtag have surpassed a billion.

And Kylie has leaned into the meme, posting some herself and even releasing some merch inspired by the viral moment.
description: Stassie announced an impromptu party celebrating their vision, for which they both posed in some matching skintight pink latex bodycon dresses, featuring a big pop art eye print.
